blogs.author: Alex

blogs.title: New blog after navigate
blogs.body:
The tutorial says to import useHistory hook from react-router-dom but it turns out that his hook is been replaced with another one called useNavigate
According to the tutorial, to use the useHistory hook to redirect to another page we should put it like this: history.push('/')
of course the history is a variable that's been assigned to the useHistory hook.
Since the useHistory hook is not available anymore, to use the useNavigate hook it pretty simple and straightforward, just type the variable and the route between the parentheses:
navigate('/')
and again the navigate is just a variable that is been assigned to the useNavigate hook in order to be able to use it inside the component.
blogs.author: Mohamed
